pastIdeasRepository.title: IoT Waste Management
pastIdeasRepository.description: This project focuses on building an IoT-based smart waste management system to optimize garbage collection in urban areas. Smart bins equipped with ultrasonic sensors monitor waste levels in real time and transmit data to a central dashboard. The system helps municipal authorities reduce fuel consumption, prevent overflow, and improve cleanliness by enabling data-driven waste collection routes.

pastIdeasRepository.title: AI Mental Health Assistant
pastIdeasRepository.description: The AI Mental Health Assistant is a conversational chatbot designed to provide early mental health support using Natural Language Processing and Machine Learning. It analyzes user sentiment, detects stress patterns, and provides personalized coping strategies. The system is not a replacement for therapy but acts as a first-level emotional support tool, especially for students.
